title: Donkey Of The Day: Woman Sentenced To 15 Years After Posing As Deputy To Free Boyfriend From Jail
itunes:title: Donkey Of The Day: Woman Sentenced To 15 Years After Posing As Deputy To Free Boyfriend From Jail
description:
Maxine Feldstein, 30, is today's Donkey of the Day after pleading guilty to helping her boyfriend escape from jail by posing as a deputy. Feldstein fooled the Washington County Detention Center into letting her boyfriend, Nicholas Lowe, go from jail after presenting false paperwork to the jailers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
